Software License

(the "Software License") that supplement the Delicious Terms of Service ("TOS")

our Privacy Policy. For more information, see our full privacy policy at
http://delicious.com/help/privacy.

find the most recent version of this Software License at

for your own noncommercial use or benefit. Your license to the Delicious

party. You may terminate the Software License by discontinuing use of all or
any of the Delicious Software and by destroying all your copies of the
applicable Delicious Software. To uninstall the Delicious Software, you may
use the standard Mozilla Firefox 'Add-ons' window.  Once you
access the 'Add-ons' window, select the 'Delicious Bookmarks' extension and click 'Uninstall'. 
The Delicious Software will be uninstalled and will no longer be visible when
you restart Firefox. This Software License terminates automatically
if you violate any term of this Software License, Delicious publicly posts a
written notice of termination on the Delicious web site, or Delicious sends a
written notice of termination to you.
 
b.  YOU MAY NOT:

distribute, or create derivative works (as defined by the U.S. Copyright Act)
or improvements (as defined by U.S. patent law) from the Delicious  Software or any portion thereof. 
 
(ii)  incorporate the Delicious Software into any computer chip or the firmware of a computing device manufactured by or for you. 
 
(iii) use the Delicious Software in any unlawful manner, for any unlawful purpose, or in any manner inconsistent with TOS or this Software License.
 
(iv)  use the Delicious Software to operate nuclear facilities, life support, or other mission critical application where human life or property may be at stake. You understand that the Delicious Software is not designed for such purposes and that its failure in such cases could lead to death, personal injury, or severe property or environmental damage for which Delicious is not
responsible. 
 
(v)  use or export the Delicious Software in violation of applicable U.S. laws or regulations
 
(vi)  sell, lease, loan, distribute, transfer, or sublicense the Delicious  Software or access thereto or derive income from the use or provision of the
Delicious  Software, whether for direct commercial or monetary gain or
otherwise, without Delicious's prior, express, written permission. 
 
2.      Ownership and Relationship of Parties. 
 
The Delicious Software is protected by copyrights, trademarks, service marks,
international treaties, and/or other proprietary rights and laws of the U.S.
and other countries. You agree to abide by all applicable proprietary rights
laws and other laws, as well as any additional copyright notices or

3.      Support and Software Updates. 
 
Delicious may elect to provide you with customer support and/or software
upgrades, enhancements, or modifications for the Delicious Software
(collectively, "Support"), in its sole discretion, and may terminate such
Support at any time without notice to you.  Delicious may change, suspend, or

availability of any Delicious Software feature, database, or content. Delicious
may also impose limits on certain features and services or restrict your access

notice or liability.

"Delicious Software Services") in Delicious's sole discretion. If Delicious

DELICIOUS LICENSORS WILL HAVE NO LIABILITY WITH RESPECT THERETO. DELICIOUS MAY

USE OF ALL OR ANY FEATURES OR TECHNOLOGY IN THE DELICIOUS SOFTWARE AT ANY TIME

You agree to indemnify and hold the Delicious Entities harmless from any claim

Thanks everyone for the feedback and comments (keep them coming!). Please use our Yahoo discussion group listed in the description, so that we can respond to you. 

Thanks for the input and giving it a try.

If you'd like to help us test new versions of our extension, check the files section of our group: http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/delicious-firefox-extension/files/

If you'd like to help us test new versions of our extension, check the files section of our group: http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/delicious-firefox-extension/files/

fields.localized_string: Delicious Bookmarks is the official Firefox add-on for Delicious, the world's leading social bookmarking service (formerly del.icio.us).  It integrates your bookmarks and tags with Firefox and keeps them in sync for easy, convenient access.
fields.localized_string_clean: Delicious Bookmarks is the official Firefox add-on for Delicious, the world's leading social bookmarking service (formerly del.icio.us).  It integrates your bookmarks and tags with Firefox and keeps them in sync for easy, convenient access.

fields.localized_string:
This extension integrates your browser with Delicious (http://delicious.com), the leading social bookmarking service on the Web.  It does this by augmenting the bookmarking functionality in Firefox with an enhanced experience that offers the following advantages:

- Search and browse your Delicious bookmarks
- Keep up to date on your Network and Links For You
- Access your bookmarks from any computer at any time
- Keep your bookmarks organized using tags
- Share your bookmarks with friends or anyone on the Web
- Import your existing Firefox bookmarks

We've also included a Classic Mode for those who want the basic Delicious buttons without any sync or search features.  This option is available when you install the add-on, and can be accessed later from the Delicious menu in Firefox.

For a product tour and more details about this extension, please visit:
http://delicious.com/help/quicktour/firefox

For product feedback, commentary & enhancement requests, please post to our discussion group, found here:
http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/delicious-firefox-extension/

or try the Delicious support forums:

http://support.delicious.com/
fields.localized_string_clean: This extension integrates your browser with Delicious (http://delicious.com), the leading social bookmarking service on the Web. It does this by augmenting the bookmarking functionality in Firefox with an enhanced experience that offers the following advantages: - Search and browse your Delicious bookmarks - Keep up to date on your Network and Links For You - Access your bookmarks from any computer at any time - Keep your bookmarks organized using tags - Share your bookmarks with friends or anyone on the Web - Import your existing Firefox bookmarks We've also included a Classic Mode for those who want the basic Delicious buttons without any sync or search features. This option is available when you install the add-on, and can be accessed later from the Delicious menu in Firefox. For a product tour and more details about this extension, please visit: http://delicious.com/help/quicktour/firefox For product feedback, commentary & enhancement requests, please post to our discussion group, found here: http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/delicious-firefox-extension/ or try the Delicious support forums: http://support.delicious.com/
